table.name: mem
table.column:
This is the {HoD:n} of a starship named {'entepray':n:name}.
In Klingon, titles generally go after the name.
The name {'archer:n:name,nolink} has been heard spoken in Klingon, but has not appeared in written canon.

table.name: mem
table.column: Captain Archer and his crew are honorable people.
Captain Archer und seine Crew sind ehrenwerte Leute.
کاپیتان آرچر و خدمه اش مردم شریف هستند. [AUTOTRANSLATED]
Kapten Archer och hans besättning är hedervärda. [AUTOTRANSLATED]
Капитан Арчер и его команда - достойные люди. [AUTOTRANSLATED]
阿切爾船長和他的船員都是光榮的人。 [AUTOTRANSLATED]
O capitão Archer e sua tripulação são pessoas honradas.

table.name: mem
table.column: Let them continue on their way.
اجازه دهید آنها در راه خود ادامه دهند. [AUTOTRANSLATED]

table.name: mem
table.column: I have nothing to say to you, human.
Ich habe dir nichts zu sagen, Mensch.
من چیزی برای گفتن به شما ندارم، انسان. [AUTOTRANSLATED]
Jag har inget att säga till dig, människa. [AUTOTRANSLATED]
Não tenho nada para lhe dizer, humano.

table.name: mem
table.column: I demand to see the magistrate!
Ich verlange den Verwalter zu sehen!
من تقاضا میکنم که دادستان را ببینم! [AUTOTRANSLATED]
I demand to see the magistrate! [AUTOTRANSLATED]

table.name: mem
table.column: Minha sentença de morte foi comutada!

table.name: mem
table.column: What do you want with me?
O que você quer de mim?

This literally means "Why do you (plural) want me?"
To address a single person, say {qatlh choneH?:sen@@qatlh:ques, cho-:v, neH:v}

table.name: mem
table.column: This can also mean "Secure her!" or "Secure it!"
Dies kann auch bedeuten "Sichern Sie sie!" oder "Sichern Sie es!" [AUTOTRANSLATED]
این همچنین می تواند به معنای "ایمن کردن او" باشد. یا "آن را ایمن کنید!" [AUTOTRANSLATED]
Detta kan också betyda "Säkra henne!" eller "Säkra det!" [AUTOTRANSLATED]
Это также может означать «Защити ее!» или "Защити это!" [AUTOTRANSLATED]
這也可能意味著“保護她！”或“保護它！” [AUTOTRANSLATED]

table.name: mem
table.column: Ziele die Waffen auf diesen Ort.
سلاح های هدف در این محل. [AUTOTRANSLATED]
Mål vapen på den här platsen. [AUTOTRANSLATED]
在這個位置上射擊武器。 [AUTOTRANSLATED]
This literally means "aim weapons on this section".
Dies bedeutet wörtlich "Waffen auf diesen Abschnitt richten". [AUTOTRANSLATED]
این به معنای واقعی کلمه به معنای "هدف قرار دادن سلاح ها در این بخش" است. [AUTOTRANSLATED]
Detta betyder bokstavligen "rikta vapen på detta avsnitt". [AUTOTRANSLATED]
Это буквально означает «нацелить оружие на этот участок». [AUTOTRANSLATED]
這字面意思是“將武器瞄準這一部分”。 [AUTOTRANSLATED]
Isso significa literalmente "apontar armas nesta seção". [AUTOTRANSLATED]

table.name: mem
table.column: Gehen Sie zurück zu den Transportkoordinaten.
بازگشت به سایت حمل و نقل [AUTOTRANSLATED]

table.name: mem
table.column: ghIq chalDaq HovDaq SIq qeylIS 'ej jatlh pa' DaqHomvetlh wovDaq HInej.
Then Kahless pointed to a star in the sky and said, "Look for me there, on that point of light."
Dann zeigte Kahless auf einen Stern am Himmel und sagte: "Bringe mich an diesen hellen Ort hier oben."
سپس Kahless به یک ستاره در آسمان اشاره کرد و گفت: "به دنبال من در آن نقطه از نور است." [AUTOTRANSLATED]
Då pekade Kahless på en stjärna på himlen och sa: "Leta efter mig där, på den punkten av ljuset." [AUTOTRANSLATED]
Затем Кахлесс указал на звезду в небе и сказал: «Ищите меня там, в этой точке света». [AUTOTRANSLATED]
然後「凱勒斯」指著天空中的一顆星說：「在那個光點上尋找我。」
Então Kahless apontou para uma estrela no céu e disse: "Procure-me lá, naquele ponto da luz".
This is part of the Story of the Promise, which tells of the departure (and prophesies the return) of {qeylIS'e' lIjlaHbe'bogh vay':n:name}.

The Klingon text comes from an inscription seen on one of the {DSC:src} trailers, while the English translation is from {TNG - Rightful Heir:src}.
Set photos show that this sentence is preceded by {Suto'vo'qor vIjaH 'ach 'opleS jIchegh 'e' vIlay'.:sen@@Suto'vo'qor:n, vI-:v, jaH:v, 'ach:conj, 'opleS:n, jI-:v, chegh:v, 'e':n, vI-:v, lay':v}

table.name: mem
table.column: The Klingon translation was done by {Qov:n:name}. The English comes from the subtitles, with punctuation edited for clarity.

table.name: mem
table.column: 願我們繼續是克林崗人！
This literally means "We are Klingon, may it continue". The English subtitles render this as "Remain Klingon!"
Dies bedeutet wörtlich "Wir sind Klingonen, möge es weitergehen". Die englischen Untertitel geben dies als "Remain Klingon!" [AUTOTRANSLATED]
این به معنای واقعی کلمه به معنای "ما کلینگون هستیم ، ممکن است ادامه یابد" باشد. زیرنویس های انگلیسی این جمله را "Remain Klingon!" [AUTOTRANSLATED]
Detta betyder bokstavligen "Vi är Klingon, får det fortsätta". De engelska undertexterna återger detta som "Remain Klingon!" [AUTOTRANSLATED]
Это буквально означает «мы клингон, пусть так и будет». Английские субтитры отображают это как «Remain Klingon!» [AUTOTRANSLATED]
這字面意思是“我們是克林崗人，請繼續下去”。英文字幕將其表示為“保持克林貢語！” [AUTOTRANSLATED]
Isso literalmente significa "Somos Klingon, que continue". As legendas em inglês traduzem isso como "Permaneça Klingon!" [AUTOTRANSLATED]

The line was deliberately translated this way as it was believed that audiences would recognise the embedded {tlhIngan maH!:sen}
This can also be interpreted as {tlhIngan maHtaHjaj!:sen@@tlhIngan:n, maH:n:1h, -taH:v, -jaj:v}, "May we continue to be Klingon". This technically violates the rule that a Type 7 suffix cannot be used with {-jaj:v:nolink} (see {TKD 4.2.9:src}), but this rule has been violated in canon.

table.name: mem
table.column: ما به دنبال چه کسی هستیم؟ [AUTOTRANSLATED]

These lines were not given a name within the show, but some have referred to it online as "the Kahless prayer" or "the prayer to Kahless".
Even though the line spoken by {tIquvma:n:name} means "Give me light to go", it was still subtitled in English as "Give us light to see". This is probably a production error.
[1] {DSC - Battle at the Binary Stars:src}, [2] {DSC - Despite Yourself}, [3] {DSC - The Wolf Inside}

table.name: mem
table.column: This was the name of an ancient city on Earth, the capital of the Akkadian Empire.
Dies war der Name einer antiken Stadt auf der Erde, der Hauptstadt des akkadischen Reiches. [AUTOTRANSLATED]
این نام یک شهر باستانی روی زمین ، پایتخت امپراتوری اکدیان بود. [AUTOTRANSLATED]
Detta var namnet på en gammal stad på jorden, huvudstaden i det Akkadiska riket. [AUTOTRANSLATED]
Это было название древнего города на земле, столицы Аккадской империи. [AUTOTRANSLATED]
這是地球上一個古老的城市的名字，阿卡德帝國的首都。 [AUTOTRANSLATED]
Este era o nome de uma cidade antiga na Terra, a capital do Império Acadiano. [AUTOTRANSLATED]

table.column: This is a word borrowed from Federation Standard to refer to a specific Terran flower.
Dies ist ein Wort, das von Federation Standard entlehnt wurde, um sich auf eine bestimmte terranische Blume zu beziehen. [AUTOTRANSLATED]
این کلمه ای است که از فدراسیون استاندارد وام گرفته شده برای اشاره به یک گل خاص Terran. [AUTOTRANSLATED]
Detta är ett ord lånat från Federation Standard för att hänvisa till en specifik Terran-blomma. [AUTOTRANSLATED]
Это слово заимствовано из Стандарта Федерации для обозначения определенного цветка терранов. [AUTOTRANSLATED]
這是從聯邦標準借來的單詞，指代特定的人族花。 [AUTOTRANSLATED]
Esta é uma palavra emprestada do Federation Standard para se referir a uma flor terráquea específica. [AUTOTRANSLATED]

table.name: mem
table.column: This is the name of a place on Earth, and so is borrowed from Federation Standard.
Dies ist der Name eines Ortes auf der Erde und wird daher von Federation Standard entlehnt. [AUTOTRANSLATED]
این نام مکانی در روی زمین است ، و از همین رو از فدراسیون استاندارد وام گرفته شده است. [AUTOTRANSLATED]
Detta är namnet på en plats på jorden och är så lånad från Federation Standard. [AUTOTRANSLATED]
Это название места на Земле, поэтому оно заимствовано из стандарта Федерации. [AUTOTRANSLATED]
這是地球上某個地方的名稱，因此是從“聯邦標準”中藉用的。 [AUTOTRANSLATED]

table.column: This is a form of ritualistic torture performed by Klingon women on prisoners of war.

This word and {norgh:n} first appeared in the novel {Sarek:src} by A. C. Crispin. Three years later, {norgh:n:nolink} appeared in {KGT:src}, but {be'joy':n:nolink} was left out, possibly to keep the book "family-friendly".[2]

table.name: mem
table.column: This is said during the ritual of discommendation ({naDHa'ghach:n}). The usual way to say "coward" is {nuch:n}.

According to the script for {TNG - Sins of the Father:src}, Worf says {tlhIH ghIj jIHyoj:sen@@tlhIH:n, ghIj:v, jIH:n:1, yoj:n}, which is not grammatical, but is supposed to mean "I fear your judgment". K'mpec then replies with {bIHnuch:sen:nolink}. It is reasonable to assume that these two phrases are archaic and ritualised.
It's likely that these sentences were made up by a writer who consulted {TKD:src}, as they contain existing words, but did not have an understanding of Klingon grammar.

table.name: mem
table.column: According to the glossary to {Honor Bound:src}, this is an animal native to {bo'retlh:n}, which makes bleating sounds and tends to run around in circles.

table.name: mem
table.column:
{tlhIngan Hol boQwI':n:nolink} "Klingon Language Assistant" - database version [[VERSION]].
To begin searching, simply press the "Search" (magnifying glass) button and type into the search box.
To hear the sounds of Klingon, you need to install a {Text-To-Speech engine:url:https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=org.tlhInganHol.android.klingonttsengine}.
It is recommended to install the {Klingon Keyboard for ASK:url:https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.anysoftkeyboard.languagepack.tlhIngan}. Otherwise, to make it easier to type Klingon on a mobile keyboard, the following shorthand (called "xifan hol") can be enabled under the Preferences menu: c ▶ {ch:sen:nolink} / d ▶ {D:sen:nolink} / f ▶ {ng:sen:nolink} / g ▶ {gh:sen:nolink} / h ▶ {H:sen:nolink} / i ▶ {I:sen:nolink} / k ▶ {Q:sen:nolink} / s ▶ {S:sen:nolink} / x ▶ {tlh:sen:nolink} / z ▶ {':sen:nolink} It is also possible to choose the alternate keymapping: k ▶ {q:sen:nolink} / q ▶ {Q:sen:nolink}
If you encounter any problems, or have any suggestions, please send me an {email at De.vID.jonpIn@gmail.com:url:mailto:De.vID.jonpIn@gmail.com?subject=boQwI%27%20feedback&body=Device:%20%0D%0AAndroid%20version:%20%0D%0A}.
Please support the Klingon language by purchasing {The Klingon Dictionary:src}, {Klingon for the Galactic Traveler:src}, {The Klingon Way:src}, {Conversational Klingon:src}, {Power Klingon:src}, and other Klingon- and Star Trek-related products from Pocket Books, Simon & Schuster, and Paramount/Viacom/CBS Entertainment.
Klingon, Star Trek, and related marks are trademarks of CBS Studios, Inc., and are used under "fair use" guidelines.
Android programming: {De'vID:n:name} Flutter (iOS) port: Daniel Dadap Klingon-English data: {De'vID:n:name,nolink}, with help from others German translations: {Quvar:n:name} (Lieven L. Litaer) Swedish translations: {Klingonska Akademien:url:http://klingonska.org/} Russian translations: Кирилл Шилов, Дэниел Дэдеп and Sirglin (Ольга Косарева) Portuguese translations: Thiago Matos TNG {pIqaD:n} font: Admiral {qurgh lungqIj:n:name,nolink} of the {Klingon Assault Group:url:http://www.kag.org/} DSC {pIqaD:n:nolink} font: {Quvar:n:name,nolink} (Lieven L. Litaer)
Special thanks to Marc Okrand ({marq 'oqranD:n:name}) for creating the Klingon language.

{tlhIngan Hol boQwI':n:nolink} "Klingonisch-Assistent" - Datenbank Version [[VERSION]].
Um eine Suche zu starten, Klicke auf das Suchsymbol (die Lupe) und gib etwas in das Suchfeld ein.
Um die klingonischen Wörter zu hören, muss die {Vorlesesoftware:url:https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=org.tlhInganHol.android.klingonttsengine} installiert werden.
Es wird empfohlen, die {klingonische Tastatur für ASK:url:https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.anysoftkeyboard.languagepack.tlhIngan} zu installieren. Um auf einer kleinen Tastatur einfacher Klingonisch einzugeben, kann in den Einstellungen die folgende vereinfachte Eingabemethode ("xifan hol" genannt) aktiviert werden: c ▶ {ch:sen:nolink} / d ▶ {D:sen:nolink} / f ▶ {ng:sen:nolink} / g ▶ {gh:sen:nolink} / h ▶ {H:sen:nolink} / i ▶ {I:sen:nolink} / k ▶ {Q:sen:nolink} / s ▶ {S:sen:nolink} / x ▶ {tlh:sen:nolink} / z ▶ {':sen:nolink} Zusätzlich kann auch die folgende Tastenbelegung ausgewählt werden: k ▶ {q:sen:nolink} / q ▶ {Q:sen:nolink}
Bei Problemen oder Vorschlägen, sende bitte eine {E-Mail an De.vID.jonpIn@gmail.com:url:mailto:De.vID.jonpIn@gmail.com?subject=boQwI%27%20feedback&body=Device:%20%0D%0AAndroid%20version:%20%0D%0A}.
Bitte unterstütze die klingonische Sprache durch den Erwerb der Bücher {The Klingon Dictionary:src}, {Klingon for the Galactic Traveler:src}, {The Klingon Way:src}, {Conversational Klingon:src}, {Power Klingon:src}, sowie der anderen Klingonen- oder Star-Trek-bezogenen Produkte von Pocket Books, Simon & Schuster, und Paramount/Viacom/CBS Entertainment.
Klingon, Star Trek, und verwandte Begriffe sind Schutzmarken von CBS Studios, Inc., und werden unter "fair use" verwendet.
Android Programmierung: {De'vID:n:name} Flutter (iOS) Portierung: Daniel Dadap Klingonisch-Englische Informationen: {De'vID:n:name,nolink}, mit Unterstützung von Anderen Deutsche Übersetzung: {Quvar:n:name} (Lieven L. Litaer) Schwedische Übersetzung: {Klingonska Akademien:url:http://klingonska.org/} Russische Übersetzung: Кирилл Шилов, Дэниел Дэдеп und Sirglin (Ольга Косарева) Portugiesische Übersetzung: Thiago Matos TNG {pIqaD:n} Schriftart: Admiral {qurgh lungqIj:n:name,nolink} von der {Klingon Assault Group:url:http://www.kag.org/} DSC {pIqaD:n:nolink} Schriftart: {Quvar:n:name,nolink} (Lieven L. Litaer)
Ein besonderer Dank richtet sich an Marc Okrand ({marq 'oqranD:n:name}) für das Erschaffen der klingonischen Sprache.

table.name: mem
table.column: This word appears in the {Star Trek - Prey:src} trilogy by John Jackson Miller. It is said to be an "old concept", in which rivals who ally in battle for a time celebrate a temporary truce after a successful joint action, before returning to hostilities.

table.name: mem
table.column: This word appears in the glossary to {Enemy Territory:src}, where it is described as a "sex aid". It is unclear as to whether it refers to a specific object, a class of objects, or even what it is in general.

table.name: mem
table.column: According to the {Haynes BoP Manual:src}, this is a type of torpedo carried on the {bI'rel tlharghDuj:n} and {vorcha':n} classes of ships.

table.name: mem
table.column: This is a hypothetical component that is found in {loDnal:n}, {be'nal:n}, {nalqaD:n}, as well as {'e'nal:n}. According to {KCD:src}, {nal:n:hyp,nolink} is not used as a word on its own.

table.name: mem
table.column: According to the {Haynes BoP Manual:src}, this is a kind of ordnance carried by a Bird of Prey ({toQDuj:n}) which can be deployed either as a short-range torpedo or as a mine distribution system.

table.name: mem
table.column: According to the {Haynes BoP Manual:src}, this is the standard torpedo type carried on the Bird of Prey ({toQDuj:n}).

table.name: mem

table.name: mem
table.column: Triticale is a hybridization of wheat (genus Triticum) and rye (genus Secale). {pev:n:hyp,nolink} is not a known word, it is known only as an element in the word {loSpev:n}.

table.name: mem
table.column: This word doesn't appear in canon, but rather was invented for a blog post about science. It's here so that someone else doesn't invent a different word.
Dieses Wort erscheint nicht im Kanon, sondern wurde für einen Blog-Beitrag über Wissenschaft erfunden. Es ist hier, damit jemand anderes kein anderes Wort erfindet. [AUTOTRANSLATED]
این کلمه در کانون ظاهر نمی شود ، بلکه برای یک وبلاگ درباره علم اختراع شده است. اینجاست که شخص دیگری کلمه دیگری اختراع نکند. [AUTOTRANSLATED]
Detta ord visas inte i kanon, utan uppfanns snarare för ett blogginlägg om vetenskap. Det är här så att någon annan inte uppfinner ett annat ord. [AUTOTRANSLATED]
Это слово не фигурирует в каноне, а было придумано для поста в блоге о науке. Это здесь, чтобы кто-то другой не придумал другого слова. [AUTOTRANSLATED]
這個詞沒有出現在佳能中，而是在有關科學的博客文章中發明的。在這裡是為了讓其他人不要發明另一個單詞。 [AUTOTRANSLATED]
Esta palavra não aparece no cânon, mas foi inventada para um post sobre ciência. Está aqui para que outra pessoa não invente uma palavra diferente. [AUTOTRANSLATED]
This word was coined by Felix Malmenbeck ({loghaD:n:nolink}), and roughly means "hidden fire".

table.name: mem
table.column: The gizzards of this animal, together with their contents, are sometimes served as food. The droppings of this animal are particularly foul-smelling.
Die Mägen dieses Tieres werden zusammen mit ihrem Inhalt manchmal als Nahrung serviert. Der Kot dieses Tieres riecht besonders übel. [AUTOTRANSLATED]
سنگدان های این حیوان به همراه مطالبشان بعضا به عنوان غذا سرو می شوند. قطرات این حیوان بویژه ناخوشایند است. [AUTOTRANSLATED]
Djurets snarkar, tillsammans med innehållet, serveras ibland som mat. Det här djurets avfall är särskilt illaluktande. [AUTOTRANSLATED]
Желудки этого животного вместе с их содержимым иногда подают в пищу. Помет этого животного особенно дурно пахнет. [AUTOTRANSLATED]
這種動物的g和它們的內容物有時被當作食物。這種動物的糞便特別難聞。 [AUTOTRANSLATED]
As moelas deste animal, juntamente com o seu conteúdo, às vezes são servidas como alimento. Os excrementos deste animal são particularmente fétidos. [AUTOTRANSLATED]
[1] {A Good Day to Die:src}, [2] {A Burning House:src}

table.name: mem
table.column: This word appears on {KGT p.132:src}, but based on the context it is clearly a typo for {bIt:v}.

table.name: mem
table.column:
In {Klingon Academy:src}, the symbol of the Klingon Empire (the imperial trefoil) is said to be called the "Heart of Virtue", or {tIq'ghob:n:nolink} "in the ancient tongue", by General Chang ({cheng:n:name}). In modern standard Klingon, "Heart of Virtue" would be {ghob tIq:n:nolink}. The two words are transposed in the manner of {paq'batlh:n}.
The three arms of the {tIq'ghob:n:nolink} are said to represent honor, loyalty, and duty.

table.name: mem
table.column: According to the glossary to {A Burning House:src}, this is a large animal native to {rura' pente':n}.

table.name: mem
table.column: This was taken by the Klingon spy Lurqal who diguised herself as a Human female, to supplement the non-Klingon food she had to eat while undercover.

Dies wurde von der klingonischen Spionin Plural übernommen, die sich als menschliche Frau verkleidet hatte, um das nicht-klingonische Essen zu ergänzen, das sie verdeckt essen musste. [AUTOTRANSLATED]
این کار توسط جاسوسی كلینگون ، پلورال انجام شد كه خود را بعنوان زن انسانی مبدل كرد ، تا غذای غیر كلینگون را كه هنگام مخفی بودن باید بخورد ، تكمیل كند. [AUTOTRANSLATED]
Detta togs av Klingon-spion Plural som förklädde sig som en mänsklig kvinna för att komplettera den icke-Klingon mat hon var tvungen att äta när hon var undercover. [AUTOTRANSLATED]
Это было взято клингонским шпионским Плюралом, который замаскировал себя как Человеческую женщину, чтобы дополнить не-клингонскую пищу, которую она должна была есть под прикрытием. [AUTOTRANSLATED]
Klingon間諜Plural偽裝成人類女性，以此來補充她臥底時必須吃的非Klingon食物。 [AUTOTRANSLATED]
Isso foi tomado pelo espião klingon Plural, que se disfarçou de uma fêmea humana, para suplementar a comida não-klingon que ela tinha que comer enquanto disfarçada. [AUTOTRANSLATED]
This was invented by author David Mack, who said it can be assumed to be in an obscure older dialect.[2]
[1] {Star Trek Vanguard - Harbinger p.200:src}, [2] {KLI mailing list 2020.06.23:src}

table.name: mem
table.column: This refers to a concept in computer programming, namely, a segment of code which is repeatedly executed until some condition is met.
Dies bezieht sich auf ein Konzept in der Computerprogrammierung, nämlich ein Codesegment, das wiederholt ausgeführt wird, bis eine Bedingung erfüllt ist. [AUTOTRANSLATED]
این به مفهومی در برنامه نویسی رایانه اشاره دارد ، یعنی بخشی از کد که به طور مکرر اجرا می شود تا زمانی که برخی از شرط ها برآورده شوند. [AUTOTRANSLATED]
Detta hänvisar till ett koncept inom datorprogrammering, nämligen ett kodsegment som upprepade gånger körs tills vissa villkor är uppfyllda. [AUTOTRANSLATED]
Это относится к концепции в компьютерном программировании, а именно к сегменту кода, который выполняется многократно, пока не будет выполнено какое-либо условие. [AUTOTRANSLATED]
這是指計算機編程中的一個概念，即重複執行直到滿足某些條件的一段代碼。 [AUTOTRANSLATED]
Isso se refere a um conceito em programação de computadores, a saber, um segmento de código que é executado repetidamente até que alguma condição seja atendida. [AUTOTRANSLATED]

table.name: mem
table.column: This word does not appear in canon. This entry is here for ease of reference only.

table.name: mem
table.column: Since this is not a grammatical sentence, one can only assume that it is in some form of {no' Hol:n}. It is recommended to say {Qapla'!:sen} or {povjaj!:excl} instead.

This ungrammatical expression appears on the back cover of {How to Speak Klingon:src}, where it is translated as "Good luck".[1] Even though the sentences inside this book were provide by the Klingon Language Institute (see {tlhIngan Hol yejHaD:n}) and use proper grammar, it seems that whoever designed the cover just copied this erroneous expression from the Internet without verifying it with a competent speaker. The originator of this expression is unknown but it appeared on some fan websites in 2011, where it is claimed that it literally means "Go with fortune".

table.name: mem
